document_data.name: ''Stormreaver's Scale Armor''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Stormreaver's scale armor''''' was an [[enchanted]] set of [[scale armor]] used in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: ''Stormreaver's scale armor'' was forged out of a mysterious metal that absorbed thunder and lightning, giving the wearer resistance and fortifying them physically.
document_data.History: In the 15{{th}} century DR, ''Stormreaver's scale armor'' could be found worn by scoundrels along the mountain paths of the [[Sword Mountains]], and sold in the Mercenary Arms Depot of the city of [[Neverwinter]].
